speaker.description: CEO of worldwide consumer unit at Amazon
speaker.whotheyare: Dave Clark leads Amazon’s global supply chain and logistics operations.
speaker.whylisten: Dave Clark oversees Amazon's global supply chain, delivery and customer service, as well as the physical stores, Prime and marketing teams. Previously, Clark held a variety of positions within Amazon, including Vice President of Global Customer Fulfillment, Vice President of North America Operations, and General Manager of a Fulfillment Center. He graduated with an MBA from the University of Tennessee and holds a Bachelor's Degree in Music Education from Auburn University.
